sentences.en: A hymn is also dedicated to him alone in Rig Veda.
sentences.cn: 利俱吠陀也有一首独一无二献身于他的诗.

sentences.en: After singing a hymn, they went out to the Mount of Olives.
sentences.cn: 可14:26他们唱了诗 、 就出来、往橄榄山去.

sentences.en: After the ceremony they joined hands and sang a hymn.
sentences.cn: 仪式结束后,他们手挽着手,高唱赞美诗.

sentences.en: Alexandra hummed an old Swedish hymn.
sentences.cn: 亚历山德拉哼起了一首古老的瑞典歌曲.

sentences.en: He liked to sing hymns as he worked.
sentences.cn: 他工作时喜欢唱赞美诗。

sentences.en: I hear the sweet, though far - off hymn that hails a new creation.
sentences.cn: 我听见从远方传来悦耳的赞美诗歌, 称颂伟大的诞生.

sentences.en: Indeed, autumn deserves a hymn -- and it has received far less tribute than it deserves.
sentences.cn: 秋天的确值得赞颂. 但 它所得到的赞颂与它应该得到的却相差甚远.

sentences.en: Nearly all joined in singing this hymn, which swelled high above the howling of the storm.
sentences.cn: 差不多所有的人都唱起这首圣诗,歌声昂扬缭绕, 盖过了暴风雨的号啸.

sentences.en: On the Eve of Christmas, followers are singing Christian hymn.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节的晚上, 教徒们在教堂吟唱赞美诗.

sentences.en: The choir has sung only two verses of the last hymn.
sentences.cn: 合唱团只唱了最后一首赞美诗的两个段落。

sentences.en: The hymn was over , the prelate had began to deliver his discourse.
sentences.cn: 赞美诗唱完了, 主教开始布道.

sentences.en: The hymn was written by an obscure Greek composer for the 1896 Athens Olympics.
sentences.cn: 这首赞歌是希腊一位名不见经传的作曲家为1896年的雅典奥运会创作的。

sentences.en: The priests piously consecrated the robbery with a hymn.
sentences.cn: 教士们虔诚地唱了一首赞美诗,把这劫夺行为神圣化了.

sentences.en: The sweet sleep of childhood invariably followed the Evening Hymn.
sentences.cn: 唱完《晚祷歌》,我就照例沉浸在童年时代那种酣睡中.

sentences.en: We should bring together the departments so that we're all singing from the same hymn sheet.
sentences.cn: 我们应该把各部门联合起来，这样我们就能意见一致了。

sentences.en: We sung the hymn in measured and solemn strain.
sentences.cn: 我们要在精致而庄严的弦乐中唱上一首赞歌.

words.tran_cn: 赞美诗的；使用赞美诗的
赞美诗（集合词）；赞美诗研究；唱赞美诗

trans.tran_en: a song of praise to God
